name: UIAccessibilityCustomAction
desc: A custom action to perform on an accessible object.

items.name: init(name: String, actionHandler: UIAccessibilityCustomAction.Handler)
items.desc: Creates a custom action object with the specified name and action handler.

items.name: init(name: String, target: Any?, selector: Selector)
items.desc: Creates a custom action object with the specified name, target, and selector.

items.name: init(name: String, image: UIImage?, actionHandler: UIAccessibilityCustomAction.Handler)
items.desc: Creates a custom action object with the specified name, image, and action handler.

items.name: init(name: String, image: UIImage?, target: Any?, selector: Selector)
items.desc: Creates a custom action object with the specified name, image, target, and selector.

items.name: init(attributedName: NSAttributedString, actionHandler: UIAccessibilityCustomAction.Handler)
items.desc: Creates a custom action object with the specified attributed name and action handler.

items.name: init(attributedName: NSAttributedString, target: Any?, selector: Selector)
items.desc: Creates a custom action object with the specified attributed name, target, and selector.

items.name: init(attributedName: NSAttributedString, image: UIImage?, actionHandler: UIAccessibilityCustomAction.Handler)
items.desc: Creates a custom action object with the specified attributed name, image, and action handler.

items.name: init(attributedName: NSAttributedString, image: UIImage?, target: Any?, selector: Selector)
items.desc: Creates a custom action object with the specified attributed name, image, target, and selector.

items.name: var name: String
items.desc: The localized name of the action.

items.name: var attributedName: NSAttributedString
items.desc: The localized name of the action as an attributed string.

items.name: var image: UIImage?
items.desc: An image that represents the action in assistive apps.

items.name: var actionHandler: UIAccessibilityCustomAction.Handler?
items.desc: A handler to perform for the action.

items.name: var target: AnyObject?
items.desc: The object that performs the action.

items.name: var selector: Selector
items.desc: The method that performs the action.

items.name: typealias UIAccessibilityCustomAction.Handler
items.desc: A closure type that defines a handler to perform for an action.
